body.name: PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Chunky Dome Statement Ring for Women | Marquise Cubic Zirconia Dome Ring | Thick Stackable Bands
features: Elevate your style with our chunky gold-plated ring featuring a stunning 3.5 x 7mm marquise-cut AAAAA CZ stone. Its bold 8mm width makes it a statement piece for women. Experience timeless elegance, designed to compliment your everyday look.

Our ring boasts a rhodium plating for a long-lasting finish. It's 100% nickel, cadmium, and lead-free, and hypoallergenic—ideal for gifting and making a fashion statement without compromising comfort.

✦ 60-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you.

✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Comfortable Piece!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love Pavoi. I own many pieces. Although the company recommends taking jewelry off prior to liquids, such as, skincare, showering, swimming, etc; but I am lazy sometimes, & yet, no issues. The gold looks good-not fake. There pieces are solid gold or filled. This ring is filled. Very smooth and comfortable to wear. Simple yet elegant looking. The stone looks decent and is placed in the ring real well. Glad to have this in my collection. Highly recommend this piece or any piece from Pavoi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, shallow setting
reviews.reviewText: I have a couple other Pavoi pieces and know the quality of their jewelry is actually really great! This ring is so comfortable to wear, and the shape and weight of the piece is perfect. The CZ itself is a great size, the drawback is that the setting is shallow and enclosed, so not enough light passes throught to set off the stone, making it look more like cut glass than a CZ.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice thick ring
reviews.reviewText: I really like the thickness of this ring, it feels comfortable to wear and fits true to size. The gold color is very flattering and looks real without being overly yellow. The stone is well-cut with many facets and sits nicely in the band. However, I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the stone in my ring looks slightly yellow. There is a pale yellow hue to it and I'm not sure if it's because of the stone itself or the glue used to attach it to the band. It doesn't look perfectly clear to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a lovely ring!!
reviews.reviewText: So items from this brand have been hit or miss for me, some items look more authentic—some look artificial and lack sparkle/quality. I am happy to report that this ring delivered in every area.The stone is sparkly, and not too dull. It looks like it could be a real stone. The size is perfect, too, since it doesn’t look gaudy or flashy. It also makes the ring look more real, since it is very understated.I LOVE the thick band style! If I ever get married (lol), I will want a solitaire like this, since it is so incredibly comfortable. Usually rings in this style are designed for men, and as a result—are too wide or thick. This domed ring is just perfect.I like it so much that I ordered a second one in a slightly larger size (in case my hands are swollen and cannot wear it on my middle right finger, as I plan).The other area that impressed me with this ring, is that the primary material is not specified or disclosed. Typically this is because it is a less quality item (either copper, brass, or steel). I was worried I would have an allergic reaction, since I am incredibly sensitive to cheaper metals—but I have had zero reaction so far, hoping it stays that way, since I love the ring!!Could not he happier with this ring and it has made me second first writing off items made by this line.For the price (so affordable!) get yourself one ASAP. ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a pretty ring! I would expect no less from Pavoi though. I have several pieces from this brand and they make excellent jewelry. I feel like a broken record, but I really do rave about the quality of Pavoi. Before I was chosen to be a member of Vine, I had bought three pairs of my own earrings from Pavoi and absolutely fell in love! I was shocked that such reasonablely priced jewelry would be so high quality and pretty.But about the ring! It's so simple and elegant. The single Marquis stone is pretty and shiny. I like how it's set into the ring, so it's completely flush with the band. The band is thick but very comfortable! You will definitely notice this!It truly looks like white gold and a diamond or white sapphire.I saw a review that said it looks cheap. I absolutely disagree. I can't speak for what the yellow gold option looks like, but the white gold is stunning.I can't recommend Pavoi jewelry enough, seriously. Every single piece I have from them is beautiful.This ring is no exception. I haven't taken it off since it arrived!⭐

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Lack of Facets in Marquise Causes Shadows/Dead Spots
reviews.reviewText: The band of the ring is pretty, sized correctly, and seems well made. However, the stone lacks facets and this causes the stone to show shadows and dead spots at all angles. This can happen with marquise stones, but the listing photos show a fully faceted stone so I hoped that it would not exhibit dead spots in person. If it was a colored stone the shadows may not be as noticeable, but with a clear stone it looks like a defect. Unfortunately, I do not see myself wearing this as the shadows really cheapen the overall look and are distracting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stone is dull
reviews.reviewText: I love the style of this ring, however, the stone is very dull! No sparkle to it at all. Cloudy. Otherwise, this ring is nice. Fits true to size. Very disappointed in the stone though. Unfortunately, this isn’t the first time I’ve received cloudy/dull stones from pavoi. I’ve actually purchased pavoi rings before, thinking they would be nice quality, and even on a free/vine review item, I am still disappointed. I’ve returned the ones I’ve purchased before, because I felt like they weren’t worth the money spent. But seeing as this one was free, I will keep it. Just be aware that you’re likely to not have quality stones when you order from this company, seeing as 4/4 rings I’ve gotten from this company I’ve returned… such a shame because I truly love the style. If you purchase from this company, make sure it doesn’t contain stones, then I’m sure you’ll be fine. I’ve worn it all day and my finger hasn’t turned green, so there’s quality in the metal at least. I’m sure their necklaces/bracelets/stacking rings/earrings would be fine quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars PAVOI gold band with marquise stone
reviews.reviewText: I love the PAVOI brand of jewelry, because the gold always has such a real look to it. And every piece that I have is a nice quality weight - substantial enough that it doesn’t feel like you could easily damage it. This ring fits true to size and it doesn’t spin around on the finger. I do like the clear marquise stone that’s embedded in the top of the ring, but I do wish it was a bit more faceted, to sparkle more. But overall it’s still quite a lovely ring that will match with anything in your wardrobe. You really can’t beat this for the price anyway.
